sub_title: Customer Experience Transformation at Tata Consultancy Services
summary:
Experienced digital transformation professional with 10+ years of experience in customer-centric services design, deployment & optimization.

Led numerous large scale customer-led digital transformations across various industry verticals (e.g. Telco, Retail, Insurance & Financial services etc.) at the intersection of business & technology.

Key strengths are:
- Customer-centric value proposition strategy definition
- Customer/ employee journey, service design, prioritization & implementation
- Product management (i.e. roadmap development, prioritization, technology development, demo’s & releases)
- Commercial process optimization (e.g. digital self-service, CPQ etc.)
- MVP roadmap build, execution and agile implementation

Experienced in leading projects and teams in customer experience design, omni-channel transformation programs, process redesign, documentation of epics, user stories, detailed requirements, design documentation, BPMN2.0. Extensive experience in facilitation of workshops, Design Thinking methods and client presence. Certified ScrumMaster® and SAFe Agilist®. 
She acquires a broad international working experience serving clients in a multitude of countries across Europe. 

On a day-2-day basis, Fanni works in client facing roles on transformation strategy programs. 
She has excellent communication and social skills that contribute to her ability to build strong relationships and to understand clients´ business objectives and challenges. 

Attributes that characterize her: proactive and seeks to drive consistent improvements to achieve results, she is a Go-Getter and enjoys working in dynamic and multi-cultural environments. Customer centric mentality. Proven track record on large transformation programs. Strong stakeholder management skills.

education.degree_name: Master of Science (MSc) in Business Studies

profile_positions.description:
Projects

•	Life Sciences, Netherlands. Engagement Manager. Managed services, 

•      Telco, Nordics. Engagement Manager. B2C Loyalty program design and fit for purpose loyalty platform solution assessment. 

•	Telco, Germany. Go-to-market strategy. Value proposition build, capability and impact analysis. Customer experience design, persona development, journey design and roadmap. MVP proposition, design and plan. 

•	Telco, Nordics. Customer Experience Manager. Omni-channel transformation program; objective to improve customer experience across consumer and corporate segments. Aim to unify customer identity data between consumer and corporate customers and unify authentication methods in order to understand and better utilize customer data. Goals & results: Customer journey optimization, common customer identification & information availability in real time, customer 360, improved customer experience (CES and NPS), advanced capability to cross sell and upsell between service departments and increase customer retention. 

•	Banking & Financial Services, NL. Business Transformation Program orchestration, operating model design. Pre-Sales and Project Management. 

•	Insurance, UK: Team Lead, Digital Transformation; service improvement and process re-design.  Enhanced Servicing Advisor Offering: develop omni layer & optimum business model (including junctions across client & 3rd parties), design customer centric processes, promote automation & standardization, ensure responsive & adaptive regulatory change environment

•	Telco, Sweden: Project Leader. Enable Seamless Collaboration as a value driver in Bid Management. Reduce sales cycle turnaround and cost; drive holistic sales experience transformation.
profile_positions.title: Customer Experience Transformation

profile_positions.description:
Projects

•	Credit Insurance, Amsterdam. Senior Product & Pricing Consultant, Configure Price Quote Management. Led a team of five Business Analysts and managed +25 stakeholders in process level 5 design. Project planning: work with operations team to define scope, resource requirements, timelines and cost estimates. Project execution: ensure on-time project management, proactively manage issues with scheduling, team or clients and mitigate risks. Delivery work: Agile framework, process designs, documentation of epics, user stories, detailed requirements, design documentation, BPMN2.0. Extensive facilitation of workshops and client presence. Certified ScrumMaster®

•	Credit Insurance, Amsterdam. Lead E-2-E Business Consultant, Product & Pricing, Configure Price Quote Management. Business process design and modernization of digital capabilities. Analysis and creation of Product and Pricing design. L3 and L4 process framework and conceptual paper of Product and Pricing.

•	Multi-Brand Digital Retailer, UK: eCommerce, New Credit Environment Transformation project. Lead Business Analyst Pricing and Product Configuration.  Business Analyst in New Credit Product Development (building a broader array of credit products & making changes agile and fast). Responsible for business requirements gathering and impact assessments within solution outline. Responsible for process design mapping (BPMN 2.0), business design documentation, scenario and use case documentation. Extensive facilitation of workshops and client presence.   

•	Consumer Packaged Goods, Amsterdam, Zurich & USA: Established a Marketing Operations Roadmap, facilitated by Design Thinking workshops, Client Interviews, Marketing Maturity Assessments.
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Strategy Consultant at IBM Global Business Services

profile_positions.description:
Projects

•	Global Retailer, Sweden: Junior project manager, Global eCommerce project. Financial and Statistical Analysis; built extensive financial metric presentations and earned value of project reviews. Forecasting & Planning for internal resources of 1000 FTEs. Extensive client negotiations. 

•	Retail Industry, European Role: Executive Assistant of European Vice President Retail IBM; Established Go-2-Market Strategy Retail Industry Europe. Worked across initiatives including: Customer value strategy and customer experience, Customer interaction & analytics, Mobile & Physical/Digital Convergence, Smarter Commerce Factory, Multi-Channel Supply Chain.     
             
•	International Consumer Electronics Manufacturer, Netherlands: Business Analyst in End-2-End Global Enterprise Transformation; Business process design, requirements gathering, business/benchmark analysis of different enabling functions (Procurement, Audit & Regulatory, and Services). Established a large number of global business processes supported by strategic business requirements and KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Digital Strategy & Transformation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
JL Business Partners was a joint venture that specialized in distribution of retail products from Finland to the Netherlands. The company pursued to build retail strategies, partnerships and channel in the Netherlands for a large portfolio of products.    

• Retail strategy, market entry and distribution channel build. Negotiations and relationships management with local vendors. Pricing, online - and offline customer campaign management. Website - , sales -  customer engagement  -, and product delivery management. Product portfolio management.
profile_positions.title: Co Founder

profile_positions.description:
Master Thesis research undertaken at Siemens Nederland (3 months). 
The research addressed intra-organizational knowledge transfer capability between the corporate headquarters and subsidiary network in relation to strategic typologies. In the research Siemens was identified in its measures and processes of knowledge management. The study’s objective was to research control mechanisms implemented within the MNE context to induce inter-unit linkages and knowledge transfers. Research findings showed the strategic importance of the implementation of mechanisms and their ability to influence behavioral attribution based outcomes.
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Research

profile_positions.description:
Earproof is a Dutch based organization, dedicated to offer distinctive and premium ear protection equipment for the entertainment industry. Earproof’s objective in 2010-2011 was to enter the Indian market which was growing largely its festival and concert scene. 

	 • Consultant / project lead. Business plan built for market expansion effort for Earproof to enter the Indian market. The one year project was undertaken as part of the study association of Economics and Business at the University of Amsterdam. Earproof hired myself and another selected candidate to conduct market research and create a business plan for its Indian market entry. The project culminated with a one month trip around India, with us building partnerships with audiologists, hearing clinics and channel partners. The Dutch embassy of India supported our efforts in India extensively. 

	• During the year and the trip to India, we collaborated extensively working together with SIEMENS Audiology in New Delhi, Mumbai and Bangalore, and were able to negotiate retail deals and to build distribution channels. Not only did we execute research and cater a plan but we achieved access to the market.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description: • Develop and implement marketing plan and strategy for electronic instrument division (marketing campaigns, partnerships, special projects, sales, customer awareness measurements, events, seminars, VIP and press tours). Management of monthly campaigns, management and creation of customer content and promotional material. Analysis of campaign records and success. High profile representation at events and customer meetings.
profile_positions.title: Internship: Marketing Communications
